paragraphs.content: Behold, I say unto you, my servants Ezra and Northrop, open ye your ears and hearken to the voice of the Lord your God, whose word is quick and powerful, sharper than a two-edged sword, to the dividing asunder of the joints and marrow, soul and spirit; and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Behold, I say unto you, my servants Ezra and Northrop, open ye your ears and hearken to the voice of the Lord your God, whose word is quick and powerful, sharper than a two-edged sword, to the dividing asunder of the joints and marrow, soul and spirit; and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

paragraphs.content: For verily, verily, I say unto you that ye are called to lift up your voices as with the sound of a trump, to declare my gospel unto a crooked and perverse generation.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For verily, verily, I say unto you that ye are called to lift up your voices as with the sound of a trump, to declare my gospel unto a crooked and perverse generation.

paragraphs.content: For behold, the field is white already to harvest; and it is the eleventh hour, and the last time that I shall call laborers into my vineyard.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For behold, the field is white already to harvest; and it is the eleventh hour, and the last time that I shall call laborers into my vineyard.

paragraphs.content: And my vineyard has become corrupted every whit; and there is none which doeth good save it be a few; and they err in many instances because of priestcrafts, all having corrupt minds.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And my vineyard has become corrupted every whit; and there is none which doeth good save it be a few; and they err in many instances because of priestcrafts, all having corrupt minds.

paragraphs.content: And verily, verily, I say unto you, that this church have I established and called forth out of the wilderness.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And verily, verily, I say unto you, that this church have I established and called forth out of the wilderness.

paragraphs.content: And even so will I gather mine elect from the four quarters of the earth, even as many as will believe in me, and hearken unto my voice.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And even so will I gather mine elect from the four quarters of the earth, even as many as will believe in me, and hearken unto my voice.

paragraphs.content: Yea, verily, verily, I say unto you, that the field is white already to harvest; wherefore, thrust in your sickles, and reap with all your might, mind, and strength.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Yea, verily, verily, I say unto you, that the field is white already to harvest; wherefore, thrust in your sickles, and reap with all your might, mind, and strength.

paragraphs.content: Open your mouths and they shall be filled, and you shall become even as Nephi of old, who journeyed from Jerusalem in the wilderness.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Open your mouths and they shall be filled, and you shall become even as Nephi of old, who journeyed from Jerusalem in the wilderness.

paragraphs.content: Yea, open your mouths and spare not, and you shall be laden with sheaves upon your backs, for lo, I am with you.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Yea, open your mouths and spare not, and you shall be laden with sheaves upon your backs, for lo, I am with you.

paragraphs.content: Yea, open your mouths and they shall be filled, saying: Repent, repent, and prepare ye the way of the Lord, and make his paths straight; for the kingdom of heaven is at hand;
paragraphs.contentHtml: Yea, open your mouths and they shall be filled, saying: Repent, repent, and prepare ye the way of the Lord, and make his paths straight; for the kingdom of heaven is at hand;

paragraphs.content: Yea, repent and be baptized, every one of you, for a remission of your sins; yea, be baptized even by water, and then cometh the baptism of fire and of the Holy Ghost.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Yea, repent and be baptized, every one of you, for a remission of your sins; yea, be baptized even by water, and then cometh the baptism of fire and of the Holy Ghost.

paragraphs.content: Behold, verily, verily, I say unto you, this is my gospel; and remember that they shall have faith in me or they can in nowise be saved;
paragraphs.contentHtml: Behold, verily, verily, I say unto you, this is my gospel; and remember that they shall have faith in me or they can in nowise be saved;

paragraphs.content: And upon this rock I will build my church; yea, upon this rock ye are built, and if ye continue, the gates of hell shall not prevail against you.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And upon this rock I will build my church; yea, upon this rock ye are built, and if ye continue, the gates of hell shall not prevail against you.

paragraphs.content: And ye shall remember the church articles and covenants to keep them.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And ye shall remember the church articles and covenants to keep them.

paragraphs.content: And whoso having faith you shall confirm in my church, by the laying on of the hands, and I will bestow the gift of the Holy Ghost upon them.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And whoso having faith you shall confirm in my church, by the laying on of the hands, and I will bestow the gift of the Holy Ghost upon them.

paragraphs.content: And the Book of Mormon and the holy scriptures are given of me for your instruction; and the power of my Spirit quickeneth all things.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the Book of Mormon and the holy scriptures are given of me for your instruction; and the power of my Spirit quickeneth all things.

paragraphs.content: Wherefore, be faithful, praying always, having your lamps trimmed and burning, and oil with you, that you may be ready at the coming of the Bridegroom—
paragraphs.contentHtml: Wherefore, be faithful, praying always, having your lamps trimmed and burning, and oil with you, that you may be ready at the coming of the Bridegroom—

paragraphs.content: For behold, verily, verily, I say unto you, that I come quickly. Even so. Amen.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For behold, verily, verily, I say unto you, that I come quickly. Even so. Amen.
